Marcus can introduce you to 8 people at CBI | Cyber Security Solutions
Marcus worked at CBI | Cyber Security Solutions

Praetorian is set to move beyond $10M in revenue -- a milestone that only 1% of companies ever achieve. Our next goal is $100M within 7 years -- something only .04% of companies ever achieve. Companies that have been able to execute at this level profitably and without any source of outside funding are rarer still.

We've built a first-in-class technical team, and now it's time to match that technical prowess with a world-class executive team. As we move into incident response, operational enablement, and remediation on the services side and SaaS delivery on the product side, we need to bring in a seasoned executive team whose seen this movie before. I look forward to cherishing everything I will learn from these individuals.

Currently, we are actively seeking a qualified VP of Services and a qualified VP of Sales -- along with another 24 security engineers. We have a formal stock option plan with an attractive equity component for all to share in the upside and blue sky that's in front of us.

Inaugural Dragos, Inc. #DragosCon keynote by Robert M. Lee.  ICS cybersecurity experts presenting/featured include Joe Slowik Ronnie Fabela Matthew Cowell Dan Gunter Ben Miller Daniel Michaud-Soucy K. Reid Wightman Mark Stacey

Quicken Loans is the largest online mortgage lender in the US. We have been named the #1 place to work in IT for 5 years running and we're among the top 10 places to work overall according to Fortune Magazine.FOCUS • Cyber Security• FinTech• Software Engineering• Infrastructure Operations• Office of the CIOLet's chat! MarcusStefanide@QuickenLoans.com
Cyber Security Career Consulting and Recruiting

CBI is largest cyber security advisory firm based in the state of Michigan and secures clients nationwide. Our strategic professional services include penetration testing, vulnerability assessments, incident response, managed security services, GRC consulting, digital forensics, security product implementations and vCISO / vCIO.• Lead corporate recruiter; provide full cycle recruitment.• Utilize a variety of sourcing methods to uncover & attract top talent; Boolean, Xray, PowerSearch, FlipSearch, Custom Search Engine, Social Media.• Develop and maintain a deep rolodex of nationwide talent.• Maintain constant communication with internal business partners.• Collaborate with marketing team to develop / update talent branding.• Thought leadership and strategy for creating an "employer of choice" environment.• Track, analyze and proactively report recruiting metrics that measure the effectiveness of service delivery to the organization.• Implement repeatable recruiting procedures that ultimately make talent acquisition more efficient and effective.• Manage company applicant tracking system (Newton, ADP).• Create and maintain relationships with key talent communities for short / long term opportunities.• Own LinkedIn partnership, expert in LinkedIn Recruiter platform.• Oversee the administration and management of the company's background check / drug testing programs.• Recruit candidates for corporate roles like project management, marketing, IT, software development and sales - successfully hired talent from Fortune 500 organizations, Big 4 advisory firms.• Hired 150+ talented professionals to date including analysts, engineers, architects, senior consultants, managers, sales executives, directors, VP’s and CXO's.• Assembled 6-man Identity & Access Management practice - first of its kind at CBI.• Hired VP of Managed Services who designed / implemented CBI's Security Operations Center - first managed services offering at CBI.

• Recruited diverse top talent in the information security industry (95% passive candidates) for CBI's professional services, sales and leadership divisions in key markets: Detroit, Columbus, Atlanta, Houston, Chicago, Charlotte and DC.• Recruited top talent based on internal needs (IT, finance, operations, marketing, sales).• Provided training & mentorship for new members of the recruiting team.• Provided ongoing support for recruiters through weekly meetings, effective recruiting tip sheets, cyber security trend discussions & availability beyond business hours. • Hired for roles like Security Engineer, SOC Analyst, Senior DLP Architect, Enterprise Account Executive (Detroit, Atlanta, Houston, DC, Charlotte), Endpoint Management Architect, Penetration Tester, SVP of Professional Services, IBM Security Pre-Sales Architect, Lab Manager (Cyber Range), Senior Security Strategist, Data Protection Practice Manager, BigFix Architect, GRC Manager, CTO, CISO and several other corporate roles.

We provide advanced cyber security solutions & services nationwide.• Used a variety of methods including boolean searches, LinkedIn Recruiter, Indeed, Bullhorn Reach, Monster, DiscoverOrg, social media strategy, college fairs, networking events and other tactics to solicit interest in CBI career opportunities.• Conducted meetings with hiring managers. Collaborated with HM's on customizing job posting strategy and interview team determination.• Managed Newton applicant tracking system and implemented Newton Gravity, employee referral program.• Negotiate offers with candidates, conduct reference/background checks using TalentWise, extend offers to candidates.• Developed attractive job descriptions, showcasing CBI's many positive aspects.• Created training materials and recruitment strategy presentations.• Coached new employees on becoming productive members of the CBI team.• Successfully recruited and managed 15 – 30 requisitions per month.• Hired for roles like Inbound Marketing Manager, Events Marketing Manager, Manager of Service Desk & IT Operations, IT Engineer, Business Consultant, IT Security Consultant, DLP Engineer, Project Manager, Symantec Solutions Architect, Senior Penetration Tester, HP Security Sales Engineer and several others.

summary: Every single professional has a unique story to tell, and I can't wait to hear it!Well connected, versatile corporate recruiting professional who thrives in high volume, fast-paced environments. I take a trusted advisor approach to recruiting which enables me to develop authentic relationships with professionals, rather than be their transactional agent. Additionally, I own consultative relationships with hiring managers and internal business partners; putting their needs first. My dynamic recruiting background includes cyber security, threat intelligence / research, internal IT, devops, software engineering, technology sales (software & services), project management and leadership among other areas. I have had success recruiting candidates from both enterprise and consulting levels - geographies include Detroit, Atlanta, Denver, Chicago, Charlotte, Boston, Houston, Dallas, Austin, Columbus, Nashville, Minneapolis, Phoenix, NYC, Bay Area, Indianapolis, Seattle, Tampa and DC.I'm always excited to speak with professionals for current/future opportunities:• Executive (VP, CIO, CISO, CTO, CMO, CFO)• Penetration Testers (OSCP, OSWP, OSWE, GPEN, GXPN, GWAPT)• Product Security Engineers (Symantec, IBM, Palo Alto Networks, Rapid7, Fortinet, CrowdStrike)• Security Operations Analysts (DLP, SIEM, Endpoint Protection, Firewalls, Patch)• Identity & Access Management Architects (SailPoint, Okta, Oracle)• Cloud Security Architects (CCSP, CCSK, PCSM)• Cloud Engineers (AWS, Azure)• Information Security Strategists | Evangelists• Governance, Risk & Compliance Consultants (PCI, HIPAA, SOX)• Developers (Full Stack, SQL, C#, .NET, Java, JavaScript, Python, PHP, Ruby)• IT Analysts, Engineers & Project Managers• Business Development Executives• Software Sales RepresentativesActive Certs:Certified Internet RecruiterAdvanced Certified Internet RecruiterCertified Diversity RecruiterCertified Social Media RecruiterProfessional Recruiter Certification
name: Marcus Stefanide, ACIR, CSMR, PRC
